name: Neewer Professional Metal Bi-Color LED Video Light for Studio, YouTube, Product Photography, Video Shooting, Durable Metal Frame, Dimmable 660 Beads, with U Bracket and Barndoor, 3200-5600K, CRI 96+

name: Neewer 2 Packs Dimmable Bi Color 480 LED Video Light Kit, 3200~5600K CRI 96+ LED Panel with U Bracket, 75 inches Tripod Light Stand for YouTube Recording Studio Photography Streaming Key Lighting
short_description: 【Powerful & Versatile Light】 With 240 white and 240 yellow LEDs, each light will offer bright, continuous, and bi-color illumination for portraits, product photos, YouTube vlogs, video gaming, and online meetings. The ultra-high CRI 96+ ensures natural and vivid color reproduction for all your creation

【Customizable Lighting】 Use the control knobs to set the brightness from 0 to 100% and color temperature from 3200K to 5600K. U-bracket allows you to swivel the light for optimal beam angles, while the white diffuser gives you soft and flattering lighting

【Sturdy Material & Sleek Design】 Made of aluminum alloy, the casing and U-shaped bracket are solid and resistant to rust and scratches. The sleek silver finishes and golden screw knobs give this light a simple but elegant look that will blend harmoniously with any home and studio decor

【Adjustable Light Stand】 The aluminum alloy light stand is durable yet lightweight. Thanks to the telescopic structure, you can adjust the height from 3’ to 6.2’ (90cm to 190cm) as required. The 1/4” screw is compatible with a wide variety of devices
【Package Contents】 2 × LED Video Light with U Bracket, 2 × Light Stand, 2 × White Diffuser, 2 × Power Adapter, 2 × Power Cable, 2 × Carrying Case for Video Light; Note: Battery is NOT Included

name: NEEWER Magnetic RGB Camera Light, 360° Full Color RGB61 Small LED Panel Video Light with 3 Cold Shoe Mounts/CRI 97+/20 Scene Modes/2500K-8500K/2000mAh Portable Recording Photography Selfie Lighting
short_description: 【Professional RGB LED Video Light】 Featuring 61 LEDs, 120° beam angle, a maximum illuminance of 800 lux at 0.5m, and a high CRI of 97+, this 6W RGB61 LED video light helps to obtain more accurate color reproduction in your images. Adjustable settings include: 0~360° hue, 0~100% brightness, and a 2500K (warm white) to 8500K (cold white) color temperature range The LCD screen on the back of the light clearly displays the light settings.

【Magnetic Design】 Designed with an integrated magnet at the rear to attach to any magnetic surface. Capture creative photos or films with this lightweight pocket size key or soft fill panel light. The detachable light diffuser softens the light for YouTube Tiktok video recording, streamer streaming, filming, makeup artist selfies, gaming, parties, vlogging, still life photography, portrait photoshoot, and more as content creator essential and influencer must have camera lighting gear

【20 Scene Modes】 There are 20 scene modes for different photography needs, including Cop Car, Ambulance, Fire Truck, Lightning, Fireworks, TV, Candle, Party, Flickering Bulb, Pulsing, Strobe, RGB Strobe, Paparazzi, Emergency, H/L Beam, Red Flash, Green Flash, Blue Flash, HSI Slow, HSI Fast. It can also be used as a very effective fill light. For optimal lighting, keep it close to your subject (within a 6.6'/2m distance)

【2000mAh Rechargeable Battery】 Equipped with a built in 2000mAh rechargeable lithium battery, this cube light will fully charge the battery in 2.6 hours. Continuous lighting time is up to 2.6 hours (at 100% brightness) after fully charged. It features a USB Type C port for convenient charging. Note: Avoid using the light while charging to protect battery life

【Multiple Mounting Options】 The portable LED light measures 3.14" x 2.6" x 1.18" / 7.97 x 6.6 x 3cm. With 1/4" female thread on bottom cold shoe and 3 cold shoes on the sides and top, it can connect to studio tripod stands, action camera cages, or mount adapter accessories compatible with DJI Osmo Pocket 3 2 Creator Combo Action 5 Pro 4 Insta 360 X5 X4 X3 Insta360 Ace Pro GoPro Hero 13 Go Pro 12 11 10 9 8 7 Black AKASO Brave 7 8 EK7000, microphones, other photography or videography equipment

name: LED Video Light Panel, Photography Lighting Portable Camera Light Built-in 20W 4000mAh Battery Type C, 2500K-8500K Photo Led Light for Video Recording Live Streaming Vlogging Outdoor Indoor

Turning a knob to color temperature switching and brightness adjusting.

The 360° ball head can ensure 360 degree horizontal rotating and 180-degree bending to any angle for photography. The hot shoe compatible with female 1/4"-20 threads mounts any item With a female 1/4"-20 Thread to the camera hot shoe. Or Attaching the light panels to the tripods is easy using the standard 1/4"" screw, and the panels can be secured in either landscape or portrait orientations.

The LED Panels has 224 beads (leds) 112 being white and 112 being warm light beads. With stepless range of 2500K to 8500K and brightness control from 0-100%. The higher 2200 lumens output and the CRI 98+ ensures accurate color reproduction. The variety of color modes and brightness levels helps object look best in different lighting conditions.

【Versatile Lighting】1* LED Light Panels, 1*Hot Shoe, 1*USB C Charge Cable, 1*User Manual. Suitable for my YouTube videos, TikTok clips, vlogs, and live streaming sessions, thanks to its advanced features and user-friendly design. Reminder: your need to prepare separate USB adapters for power, the kit doesn’t come with any.

A portable photography tripod light stand and 4 color filters included, for makeup lash (eyelash) artist, esthetician, tattoo, barber, selfie photos, Tiktok/YouTube social media video recording, podcast, Facetime, Zoom call, video conference, live streaming, vlogging, filming, camera photoshoot

short_description: 【Introducing NEEWER BASICS】 Simple and practical, NEEWER BASICS is an economical product line that focuses on essential functions and designs, without unnecessary extras and materials. 【LED Panel Video Lighting Kit】 This LED light can brighten up your appearance and make you look amazing in front of the webcam—whether you are attending a Zoom meeting, live streaming on social media, shooting a vlog for your YouTube channel, making podcast videography as a content creator, or simply looking a makeup light as a makeup artist.

【Bi Color LED Video Light】 The BP300 LED panel light features 300 high performance LEDs (150 warm white & 150 cool white), delivers up to 850 lux at 0.5m with a 10W power output, offers 5 adjustable color temperature from 2700K to 6500K and 10 brightness levels from 10% to 100%. Ideal for key or fill lighting in portrait photo photography, studio photoshoot, for YouTube video recording, podcast, interviews, streamer live streaming, makeup artist barber tattoo studios, and beauty care

【Natural & Soft Panel Lighting】 The 300 premium LEDs are evenly distributed inside the wide panel of 9.84''x6.69''/25cmx17cm (11.3"), producing soft, delicate, and natural light with no flicker. The embedded diffuser allows for larger light coverage, effectively reducing shadows and dark corners. The high CRI of 95 reproduces the true beauty of the subjects, ensuring natural texture in makeup shoots, live streaming, still life photography as content creator essential and influencer must have

name: NEEWER 9" LED Video Light Panel, Dimmable DSLR Camera Soft Lighting with Mini Desk Tripod Stand, USB Type C Ports, 3200K~5600K CRI95+ for Studio Photography Video Recording Live Streaming, NL-116AI
short_description: 【Versatile LED Video Light Panel Kit】 The 9" LED video key light features 58 warm and 58 cool LEDs, delivering a 10W max output with a max illumination of 600lux/0.5m and a high CRI of 95+. Lighting equipment for podcast video recording, portraits, studio photoshoots, product/food photography, live streams, etc. With a mini tripod for height adjustment, a cold shoe adapter for angle positioning, a USB cable, and a 4000mAh built in lithium battery for charging. Note: Carry Bag is NOT included

【Enhanced Precision Control】 This LED light panel allows for precise adjustment of color temperature and brightness. The power switch can be easily toggled with just one press. The brightness and color temperature can be fine tuned using knobs, with each increment being 1%. The brightness can be adjusted from 0% to 100%, while the color temperature ranges from 3200k to 5600k, catering to diverse shooting requirements

【Extended Battery Life & Convenient Charging】 Equipped with a built in 3.7V 4000mAh lithium battery, the portable LED light offers a runtime of 1.5 hours. It can be fully charged in just 2 hours, supporting both Type C and USB ports for hassle free charging. A USB C charging cable is included for added convenience

【Camera Gear with Cold Shoe Adapter】 With a 1/4" cold shoe adapter, the fill light equipment of this photography and videography lighting accessories kit can be installed on the top of DSLR cameras and camcorders, compatible with Canon Nikon Sony Fujifilm fuji mirrorless digital cameras, and allows for 180° front and back tilt for your desired shooting angles

With its robust and rust resistant construction, the portable desk/table tripod stand guarantees reliable performance under daily wear. Ideal soft light for Zoom calls, makeup artists, selfies lighting, YouTube/TikTok vlogging, creative filming by content creators, streamers, social media influencers, etc

name: Neewer 18" Led Video Light Panel Key Lighting Kit with Remote, 2-Pack 45W Dimmable Bi Color + Tripod Stand, 3200K–5600K Soft Light CRI 97+ 4800Lux for Game Live Streaming Studio Photography Recording

Remote Control: Easily turn the light on/off, control the light settings, and switch between 40 channels and 4 groups (A/B/C/ABC) with the 2.4GHz remote

name: NEEWER 2 Pack Bi Color 660 LED Video Light and Stand Kit: (2) 3200-5600K CRI 96+ Dimmable Light with U Bracket and Barndoor, (2) 75 inches Light Stand for Studio Photography, Video Recording (Black)
short_description: 【Bi Color Dimmable LED Studio Light】 With 330 warm white and 330 cool white LEDs, this 660 40W LED Video Light features a maximum illuminance of 3300 lux/1m, 3200K-5600K adjustable color temperature, and 0-100% adjustable brightness. The high CRI of 96+ ensures an authentic reproduction of colors. Voltage: DC 12V; Input Voltage: 100V-240V; Battery Output: DC 14.8V. Consistent and flicker free lighting is essential for filmmakers, portraits, product photography, YouTube videos, gaming, and more

【Premium Metal Design】 The rugged aluminum design allows the heat to dissipate effectively without the need of a noisy fan. The metal barndoor helps shape the light and control light spill. And the U shaped mounting bracket allows you to tilt the light panel 360° to achieve a desired lighting angle

【Dual Power Options & LCD Screen】 Power the lights with an AC power adapter or enjoy cable free operation with an NP-F550 or NP-F970 Li ion battery (Not included) when you photograph outdoors. High definition LCD screen lets you check the brightness, color temperature and battery power in real time

【Stable Light Stand】 Aluminum alloy light stand is solidly built and can extend from 26" to 75" (66 to 190cm) for flexible light positioning. The locking knobs enable you to adjust the stand’s height and tightly lock each section for extra stability
【Package Contents】 2 x 660 LED Video Light, 2 x Light Stand, 2 x Power Adapter, 2 x Power Cable, 2 x Carrying Bag for the Video Light
